tool_description: The script detects liveness of a person in front of the camera real time
name: Liveness Detector
title: Liveness Detector

api_list.name: process
api_list.description: This will just take it images encoded as base64 and process it
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://liveness-detector.p.rapidapi.com/process"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "liveness-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://liveness-detector.p.rapidapi.com/process"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "liveness-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
